shot_metadata.name: SPEARS_ENTER_FLESH
shot_metadata.title: Spears Enter Flesh - Divine Sacrifice
shot_metadata.narrative_function: Divine sacrifice enabling abundance through willing death

progressive_state: Marking moment | Blood beginning | Camera frost 0% | Whale accepts | Watching: The pact sealed

prompt_variants.subject: A 70-foot fin whale's grey back breaking the surface between three boats, three men standing with raised spears including [MAGNÚS], iron spear points entering whale flesh behind the pectoral fin, bright red blood flowing from wounds into water.
prompt_variants.action: Whale surfaces slowly. Grey skin wet, reflecting morning light. Back 8 feet wide visible above water. Magnús stands in boat bow, knees bent for balance. Raises 7-foot spear above shoulder. Two other men in other boats also stand, spears raised. Whale continues moving forward at 2 knots. Magnús throws spear. It flies in arc, iron point enters flesh 2 feet deep behind whale's left pectoral fin. Immediately blood flows from wound - bright red, thick. Second spear enters whale's back near dorsal fin. Third spear hits lower back. All three spears remain embedded, shafts sticking out at angles. Blood flows from all three wounds, running down grey skin into water. Whale's tail rises slightly, then slides beneath surface. Whale begins diving, spear shafts disappearing under water. Blood spreads on surface in three distinct streams, merging into single wide trail pointing toward shore.
prompt_variants.scene: Open ocean, 500 yards from shore. Three boats in triangle formation around whale. Dawn light making blood appear bright red against dark blue water.
prompt_variants.style: Shot from water level between boats, camera 20 feet from whale (that's where the camera is), showing spears entering and blood flowing.
prompt_variants.camera_position: Water level 20 feet from whale between boats, that's where the camera is

primary_sounds: Spears piercing flesh with wet thud

prompt_variants.negative_prompt: no subtitles, show three spears embedded, blood flowing clearly, whale diving slowly, 1080p

others.mathematical_impossibility: Three spears thrown but four visible upon impact
others.whale_consciousness: Eye shows calm acceptance, positioning optimal for hunters
others.blood_mathematics: Spiral patterns pulsing at 12/min house rhythm
others.sound_enhancement: Impact sound as submerged bell tone (industrial contamination foreshadowing)

notes.thematic_purpose: Divine guardian sacrificing for community survival
notes.mathematical_element: First visible counting impossibility - extra spear
